mapper.update: update se_business_opportunity set customer_id = #{customerId}, customer_name = #{customerName}, bo_name = #{boName}, bo_status = #{boStatus}, bo_full_stage = #{boFullStage}, bo_follow_stage = #{boFollowStage}, bo_editor_id = #{boEditorId}, bo_editor = #{boEditor}, bo_responsible = #{boResponsible}, bo_responsible_id = #{boResponsibleId}, bo_amount = #{boAmount}, bo_expect_date = #{boExpectDate}, bo_notes = #{boNotes} where id = #{id}
